original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhaddāya kāpilāniyā antevāsinī bhikkhunī bhaddaṁ kāpilāniṁ sakkaccaṁ upaṭṭheti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena bhaddāya kāpilāniyāḥ antevāsinī bhikkhunī bhaddam kāpilānim sakkaccam upaṭṭheti

original: “ayaṁ maṁ, ayye, bhikkhunī sakkaccaṁ upaṭṭheti, imissāhaṁ cīvaraṁ dassāmī”ti.
analyzed: ayam me ayye bhikkhunī sakkaccam upaṭṭheti imissā aham cīvaram dassāmi iti

original: Atha kho sā bhikkhunī duggahitena dūpadhāritena paraṁ ujjhāpesi—
analyzed: atha kho sā bhikkhunī duggahitena dūpa dhāritena param ujjhāpesi

original: “ahaṁ kirāyye, ayyaṁ na sakkaccaṁ upaṭṭhemi, na kira me ayyā cīvaraṁ dassatī”ti.
analyzed: aham kirāyye ayyam na sakkaccam upaṭṭhemi na kira me ayyā cīvaram dassati iti

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: yāḥ tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ appicchāḥ pe tāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhunī duggahitena dūpadhāritena paraṁ ujjhāpessatī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhunī duggahitena dūpa dhāritena param ujjhāpessati iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī duggahitena dūpadhāritena paraṁ ujjhāpetī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave bhikkhunī duggahitena dūpa dhāritena param ujjhāpeti iti

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī duggahitena dūpadhāritena paraṁ ujjhāpessati.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhave bhikkhunī duggahitena dūpa dhāritena param ujjhāpessati
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu

original: “Yā pana bhikkhunī duggahitena dūpadhāritena paraṁ ujjhāpeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī duggahitena dūpadhāritena param ujjhāpeyya pācittiyanti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetā bhikkhunī iti
upasampannāya upasampanna saññā ujjhāpeti āpatti pācittiyassa
upasampannāya anupasampanna saññā ujjhāpeti āpatti pācittiyassa
an upasampannāya upasampanna saññā āpatti dukkaṭassa
an upasampannāya an upasampanna saññā āpatti dukkaṭassa
